title.rendered: Mason Clements: Net Worth 2023, Career Earnings

content.rendered:
Summary

  • About Mason Clements
    • Early Career 
    • Professional Career
  • Mason Clements’s Net Worth in 2023
    • Career Earnings
  • Personal Details
    • Wife 
    • How old is he?
    • What is his nationality?
    • FAQs About Mason Clements 

Mason Clements is a professional rodeo contestant known for his exceptional skills in bareback riding. Born in 1995, Clements hails from Spanish Fork, Utah, and has made a name for himself in the rodeo circuit, qualifying for the Wrangler National Finals Rodeo four times.

Here you can follow Mason Clements’s net worth, career earnings, professional career, achievements, relationship status, and more.

About Mason Clements

Clements was not raised in a traditional rodeo environment. His interest in the sport was sparked at a young age by family friends who participated in junior rodeos. 

As he grew older, his interest in motocross took over until he met race-horse trainers Glade and Lori Van Tassel, who reignited his passion for horses and introduced him to the rodeo world.

Early Career 

In his early career, Clements initially focused on bull riding. However, after attending several rodeo schools and clinics, he decided to switch to bareback riding at the age of 18. 

This decision was made after watching the bareback riding at the Scottsdale Pro Rodeo, which he felt was more his style.

Professional Career

Mason Clements is a professional rodeo contestant from Spanish Fork, Utah, known for his exceptional skills in bareback riding. He began his professional career in 2015 when he joined the Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association (PRCA). 

Since then, he has qualified for the Wrangler National Finals Rodeo (NFR) four times. Throughout his professional career, Clements has achieved significant success, winning several championships. 

Some of his notable wins include the Beef Empire Days PRCA Rodeo in 2019, the RAM National Circuit Finals Rodeo, and the RAM Wilderness Circuit Finals Rodeo in 2023. In 2023, he also won the Governor’s Cup, securing his fourth NFR qualification.

Clements’ dedication to the sport is evident in his pursuit of the Triple Crown of Rodeo Dreams, which involves winning three prestigious rodeo titles. He has already won the Rodeo Corpus Christi and is aiming for more victories in the future.

As he continues to compete in PRCA rodeos, Clements remains focused on achieving his goals and furthering his success in the sport.

Mason Clements’s Net Worth in 2023

As of 2023, Mason Clements’s net worth is $1.5 million.

Career Earnings

Mason Clements, a professional rodeo contestant, has earned significant income from his successful career in bareback riding. His earnings are primarily from his winnings in various rodeo competitions.

In 2020, Clements finished 10th in the world standings with $124,771, including $66,269 in earnings from the National Finals Rodeo (NFR).

In the same year, he earned more than $58,000, with significant winnings from various championships across the country. For instance, he earned $11,700 from a single ride at the San Antonio Stock Show and Rodeo.

In 2018, Clements’ earnings reached $130,267, which included a $20,731 prize for placing second in the first round of the NFR. In the previous year, he had left the NFR with more than $80,000 in earnings.

Clements earned $126,166, in the 2023 regular season. His major wins that year included the Wilderness Circuit Finals Rodeo, where he won $5,283, the San Antonio Rodeo with a $9,000 prize, the Sisters Rodeo with a $5,711 prize, and the Governor’s Cup Rodeo, where he won $28,750. He also won $16,750 at the Rodeo Carolina event.

Personal Details

Wife 

Mason Clements is married to a woman named Brianna. The couple got engaged and planned their wedding for June. They have a daughter together.

How old is he?

As of 2023, Mason Clements is 28 years old.

What is his nationality?

He is an American by nationality. 

FAQs About Mason Clements 

When did Mason Clements start his rodeo career?

Mason Clements started his rodeo career at the age of 18.

How many times has he qualified for the Wrangler National Finals Rodeo?

As of 2023, he has qualified for the Wrangler National Finals Rodeo four times.

Who is his wife?

He married Brianna.
